story.text: TORONTO Jan 2 The Toronto Stock Exchange's main index closed up on Tuesday, ending the first trading session of 2007 on a positive note, lifted by the resource sector. The Toronto Stock Exchange S&P/TSX composite index .GSPTSE unofficially closed up 11.49 points, or 0.1 percent, at 12,919.88. ($1=$1.16 Canadian)
story.title: toronto stocks start year on a positive note
